She looked over at the foundation again and saw two poles rise out from the top layer. Once they came to a stop she began to wonder what they were but was interrupted by the sound of applause.

Joyce spent a week creating clones of herself. They were her height, weight, and had her facial appearance but that was where the similarities ended. All of her clones were naked but what was really bizarre was the fact that they were all pink. Not only that but though they all had breast there were no nipples. Also they had no outline of a vagina. They resembled barbie dolls in a way but were life-sized yet show no signs of life. It was as if all sixteen were androids. They all also had a set of numbers marked on their waistlines that read "JOY-01" all the way to "JOY-16". Joyce stood in the center of the arena and watched as her clones walked in a single line to the left side before they faced her direction side-by-side near the edge.

Joyce: You all look good, my children. I hope you are ready to proceed with the next phase. I shall call two of you at a time to face off against one another at random. Here are the results!

A large screen suddenly appeared from the center of the arena on the sidelines. It was a black screen that then flashed yellow letters and numbers that read:

FLEX-OFF! TOURNAMENT



ROUND 1:
Match 1: JOY-01 Vs. JOY-10

Match 2: JOY-13 Vs. JOY-05

Match 3: JOY-09 Vs. JOY-04

Match 4: JOY-07 Vs. JOY-16

Match 5: JOY-02 Vs. JOY-11

Match 6: JOY-03 Vs. JOY-15

Match 7: JOY-06 Vs. JOY-14

Match 8: JOY-08 Vs. JOY-12

Joyce: Yes, my children! I have created you all for this sole purpose. To compete against one another in a tournament! It is going to be special indeed. Get ready to witness what is in store! It will be one hell of a show like no other!! Let the FLEX-OFF begin! HAHAHAHA!!
